body: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/7466U3ZMMqUqLlQid-7gFmwFcbDmHyVafqAJ4Q8CQ2B2fPTeyAH6yuJCoou2ysd1HK3sPGdlFveX-xgKtZNKlXcdO6wv-u1W/daylightnote.jpg)Hi Blanca, I flip back and forth quite often between imperial and metric projects and usually find that when I recycle code for a daylight simulation I forget to adjust the grid units and crash the simulation. have you checked this? Rob
